legendaryActions.name: Hooves
legendaryActions.description: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendaryActions.name: Shimmering Shield
legendaryActions.description: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's turn.

legendaryActions.name: Heal Self
legendaryActions.description: The unicorn magically regains 11 (2d8 + 4) hit points.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: If the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
abilities.description:
The unicorn's innate spellcasing ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: Detect Evil and Good, Druidcraft, Pass Without Trace
1/day Each: Calm Emotions, Displ Evil and Good, Entangle

abilities.name: Magic Resitance
abilities.description: The Unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

abilities.name: Magic Weapons
abilities.description: The unicorns weapon attacks are magical

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft, one target
Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage

actions.name: Horn
actions.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft, one target
Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/day)
actions.description: The Unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 4) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

actions.name: Teleport (1/day)
actions.description: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.
